attributes.action: free for over night parking so all HGV vehicles can park safely and securely
attributes.additional_details: £25 for 24 hours when drivers are there for minimum of 9 hours to at most 11-12 hours
attributes.background: HGV drivers are being charged too much for the little time that they spend overnight in services which makes the have to stay in lay bys which is unsecure with the risk of diesel and loads being stolen costing companies thousands so we urge you to sign this so we can get secure parking for all HGVs
